sentences.translation: 《最后的圣殿骑士》，雷蒙德·库利。

sentences.sentence: Lars was looking for the treasure of the Knights Templar.
sentences.translation: 佬司在寻找圣殿武士们的宝藏。

sentences.sentence: I would say that today at the Round Tower you came face-to-face with a brother of the Knights Templar.
sentences.translation: 要我说今天在圆塔上，你已经跟圣殿骑士团的武士们面对面了。
